definitions.text: the topic that a person, committee, or piece of research is expected to deal with or has authority to deal with
examples: they set up a group with a remit to suggest ways for strengthening family life

definitions.text: (law) the act of remitting (especially the referral of a law case to another court)
hold back to a later time
refer (a matter or legal case) to another committee or authority or court for decision
make slack as by lessening tension or firmness
